æœ‰æ—¶å€™ä¼šæƒ³æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯è‡ªå·±è€äº†å•Š,å»å¹´è¿™ä¼šåˆšå·¥ä½œ,ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æ¯å¤©å¾ˆç´¯,å› ä¸ºå¾ˆå¤šä¸œè¥¿è¦å­¦,è®°å¾—å½“æ—¶æ¯å¤©æ™šä¸Šçœ‹ä¹¦åˆ°ä¸¤ç‚¹,å‘¨æœ«ä¸åŠ ç­çš„æ—¶å€™,ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æ¨äº†å¾ˆå¤šâ€™çº¦ä¼šâ€™,ç¡ä¸Šä¸€ä¸Šåˆ,ç„¶ååˆå¼€å§‹æ•²ä»£ç â€¦

å¾ˆç´¯çš„æ—¶å€™,æœ‰æ—¶å€™çœŸçš„æ˜¯æƒ³æ”¾å¼ƒ,æœ‰äº²æˆšè·Ÿæˆ‘æ‰“ç”µè¯,è¯´ä»–ä»¬é‚£å„¿æ‹›è¿™ç§åˆšæ¯•ä¸šçš„å­¦è®¡ç®—æœºçš„,ä¸€ä¸ªæœˆåˆšå¼€å§‹5000,è¿˜ç»™è§£å†³ä½æˆ¿é—®é¢˜,é—®æˆ‘è¦ä¸è¦è€ƒè™‘å›å»,æ¯•ç«Ÿå¸éƒ½çœŸçš„å¾ˆææ€–;å¯æ˜¯æˆ‘åˆšæ¯•ä¸šæŠ€æœ¯è¿˜æœ‰å¾ˆå¤§çš„ä¸Šå‡ç©ºé—´,è¿˜æ˜¯åŒ—äº¬è¿™æ ·çš„å¤§åŸå¸‚æŠ€æœ¯å‘å±•æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½,æ›´èƒ½å¿«é€Ÿæˆé•¿,

entry.title: æ­å¼€vueç¥ç§˜é¢çº±
entry.content:
å¸¦ä½ ä¸€æ­¥ä¸€æ­¥èµ°è¿›vue

About

æºç 
aboutme
github
blog

å®ç°è¿‡ç¨‹,ç›´æ¥ä¸Šä»£ç 

1,å®ç°ç®€å•çš„v-modelçš„ç»‘å®š
2,å®ç°å¤šä¸ªv-modelçš„ç»‘å®š
3,å®ç°æ¨¡æ¿çš„ç»‘å®š
4,å®ç°v-bind,v-onçš„ç»‘å®š
/**
 * è§£ædomæŒ‡ä»¤
 * @param {*} $dom æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
 * @param {*} instructs è§£æç»“æœ
 */
function handleInstruct($dom, instructs = {}) {
    function addInstruct(model, type, $node) {
        if (instructs[model]) {
            if (instructs[model][type]) {
                instructs[model][type].push($node);
            } else {
                instructs[model][type] = [$node];
            }
        } else {
            instructs[model] = {
                [type]: [$node]
            };
        }
    }

    if ($dom.attributes) {
        for (const attr of $dom.attributes) {
            if (attr.name === 'v-model') {
                const model = $dom.getAttribute('v-model');
                addInstruct(model, 'model', $dom);
            } else if (/^(v-bind|:)/.test(attr.nodeName)) {
                const parseResult = attr.nodeName.match(/^(?:v-bind)?:([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)/);
                if (parseResult && parseResult[1]) {
                    addInstruct(attr.nodeValue.trim(), 'bind', {
                        $dom,
                        attr: parseResult[1]
                    });
                }
            } else if (/^(v-on|@)/.test(attr.name)) {
                const parseResult = attr.name.match(/^(?:v-on:|@)?([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)/);
                if (parseResult && parseResult[1]) {
                    addInstruct(attr.nodeValue.trim(), 'on', {
                        $dom,
                        event: parseResult[1]
                    });
                }
            }
        }
    }

    if ($dom.childNodes) {
        for (const $child of $dom.childNodes) {
            switch ($child.nodeType) {
                // ELEMENT_NODE
                case 1: {
                    handleInstruct($child, instructs);
                    break;
                }
                // TEXT_NODE
                case 3: {
                    const parseResult = $child.data.match(/{{[ ]*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)[ ]*}}/g);
                    if (parseResult) {
                        parseResult.forEach(x => {
                            const model = x.match(/[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/);
                            if (model) {
                                addInstruct(model, 'expression', {
                                    $dom: $child,
                                    exp: $child.data
                                });
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    break;
                }
                default:
                    break;
            }
        }
    }

    return instructs;
}

function updateDom(vm, instructs, model, shouldRegisterEvent = false) {
    // å®ç°v-modelçš„ç»‘å®š
    if (instructs[model].model) {
        for (const $el of instructs[model].model) {
            $el.value =  vm[model];
            if (shouldRegisterEvent) {
                $el.oninput = () => {
                    this[model] = $el.value;
                };
            }
        }
    }
    // å®ç°{{}}çš„ç»‘å®š
    if (instructs[model].expression) {
        for (let { $dom, exp } of instructs[model].expression) {
            const parseResult = exp.match(/{{[ ]*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)[ ]*}}/g);
            if (parseResult) {
                parseResult.forEach(x => {
                    const m = x.match(/[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/);
                    if (m) {
                        exp = exp.replace(new RegExp(`{{[ ]*${m[0]}[ ]*}}`), vm[m[0]]);
                    }
                });
            }
            $dom.textContent = exp;
        }
    }
    // å®ç°v-bindçš„ç»‘å®š
    if (instructs[model].bind) {
        for (const {$dom, attr} of instructs[model].bind) {
            $dom.setAttribute(attr, vm[model]);
        }
    }
}

function Vue(params) {
    const $dom = document.querySelector(params.el);
    if (!$dom) {
        console.error(`dom "${params.el}" not exist`);
        return;
    }

    const vm = {};
    const instructs = handleInstruct($dom);
    // console.log(instructs);

    for (const model in instructs) {
        if (model && params.data && Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(params.data, model)) {
            vm[model] = params.data[model];
            Object.defineProperty(this, model, {
                get: function() {
                    return vm[model];
                },
                set: function(newValue) {
                    vm[model] = newValue;
                    updateDom(vm, instructs, model);
                }
            });
            updateDom.call(this, vm, instructs, model, true);
        }
        // å®ç°v-onçš„ç»‘å®š
        if (instructs[model].on) {
            for (const { $dom, event } of instructs[model].on) {
                $dom.addEventListener(event, params.methods[model].bind(this));
            }
        }
    }
}

window.Vue = Vue;

  • for in éå†çš„æ˜¯æ•°ç»„çš„ç´¢å¼•(å³é”®å)ï¼Œè€Œfor of éå†çš„æ˜¯æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ å€¼

  • for of ç”¨æ¥éå†æ•°ç»„çš„å€¼

å°¾è°ƒç”¨ä¸ä¸€å®šå‡ºç°åœ¨å‡½æ•°å°¾éƒ¨ï¼Œåªè¦æ˜¯æœ€åä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œå°±è¡Œ

å‡½æ•°må’Œnéƒ½å±äºå°¾è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œä»–ä»¬éƒ½æ˜¯å‡½æ•°çš„æœ€åä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œ

å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨ä¼šåœ¨å†…å­˜å½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªâ€™è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•â€˜ï¼Œä¿å­˜è°ƒç”¨ä½ç½®å’Œå†…éƒ¨å˜é‡ç­‰ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨Aå‡½æ•°ä¸­è°ƒç”¨Bå‡½æ•°ï¼Œåœ¨Aå‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•ä¸Šè¿˜ä¼šå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªBçš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•ï¼Œç­‰åˆ°Bå‡½æ•°è¿è¡Œç»“æŸåï¼ŒæŠŠç»“æœè¿”å›åˆ°Aï¼ŒBçš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•æ‰ä¼šæ¶ˆå¤±ã€‚å¦‚æœå‡½æ•°Bå†…éƒ¨è¿˜è°ƒç”¨Cå‡½æ•°ï¼Œé‚£å°±æ˜¯è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªCçš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•æ ˆï¼Œä»¥æ­¤ç±»æ¨ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰çš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªâ€™è°ƒç”¨æ ˆâ€˜ã€‚

å°¾è°ƒç”¨åœ¨äºå®ƒç‰¹æ®Šçš„è°ƒç”¨ä½ç½®ã€‚ç”±äºæ˜¯å‡½æ•°æœ€åä¸€æ­¥æ“ä½œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸éœ€è¦ä¿ç•™å¤–å±‚å‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè°ƒç”¨ä½ç½®å’Œå†…éƒ¨å˜é‡éƒ½ä¸ä¼šå†ç”¨åˆ°äº†ã€‚

â€™å°¾è°ƒç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–â€˜ï¼Œåªè°ƒç”¨å†…å±‚å‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨è®°å½•ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰å‡½æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯å°¾è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®Œå…¨å¯ä»¥åšåˆ°æ¯æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨è®°å½•åªæœ‰ä¸€é¡¹ï¼Œè¿™å°†å¤§å¤§èŠ‚çœå†…å­˜ã€‚

entry.title: react-redux
entry.content:
redux

reduxçš„ä¸‰ä¸ªæ¦‚å¿µ: action reducer store

  • action: ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«typeçš„object, é€šå¸¸æŠŠä¸€ä¸ªè¿”å›actionå¯¹è±¡çš„å‡½æ•°ç§°ä¸ºactionå‡½æ•°, ç›´æ¥ç®€ç§°ä¸ºaction
  • reducer: ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¹æ®action typeæ¥æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®çš„å‡½æ•°
  • store: ä½¿ç”¨createStoreä»reducerå‡½æ•°åˆ›å»ºçš„æ•°æ®å¯¹è±¡, åŒ…å«getStateå’Œdispatchæ–¹æ³•

react-redux

ç”¨äºå°†reduxäºreactç»“åˆ

  • Provider: é¡¶å±‚ç»„ä»¶, æ³¨å…¥storeå¯¹è±¡
  • connect: å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°, å‚æ•°ä¸€ä¸ºå‡½æ•°, è¯¥å‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶state, è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡, å¯¹è±¡åŒ…å«ä¸€ç³»åˆ—æ•°æ®. å‚æ•°äºŒä¸ºå‡½æ•°, è¯¥å‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶dispatch, è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡, å¯¹è±¡åŒ…å«ä¸€ç³»åˆ—æ–¹æ³•
